name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Programming Engineer with over 13 years of extensive experience in software development, specializing in **C#**, **Java**, and **Python**. Proven expertise in building robust applications while integrating innovative pedagogical skills to enhance user experience, creativity in problem-solving, and patience in mentoring team members.

Advanced proficiency in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, alongside hands-on experience in frontend and backend development using frameworks such as **React**, **Node.js**, and **Django**. Strong background in leveraging cloud platforms like **AWS** and **Azure** for deploying and managing scalable, high-performance applications.

Adept in implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines, with a proven track record in delivering compliance-driven development aligned with industry standards. Committed to continuous learning and adapting new technologies to optimize application performance and enhance user engagement.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **C#**, **Java**, **Python**, and **C++** to design and develop software solutions, ensuring optimal performance and maintainability across multiple applications.
Implemented creative problem-solving techniques and pedagogical skills to mentor junior developers, fostering an environment of learning and growth.
Developed engaging educational software for platforms like **Minecraft** and **Scratch**, enhancing user interaction and learning experiences through gamification.
Demonstrated patience and creativity in debugging complex software issues, ensuring timely delivery of project milestones and high-quality end products.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance coding practices and software design principles, contributing to a cohesive development process.
Applied version control systems effectively to manage codebase and documentation, ensuring project transparency and continuity.
Participated in code reviews, providing constructive feedback and fostering a culture of improvement within the engineering team.
Maintained documentation for software design and development processes, ensuring compliance with industry best practices and standards.

Leveraged proficiency in **C#**, **Java**, and **Python** to modernize core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture using **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, enhancing scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
Utilized **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript** to build interactive front-end applications with Redux Toolkit and **Tailwind CSS**, creating sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.
Delivered real-time analytics dashboards with **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies.
Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows such as payments, alerts, and compliance.
Developed ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time processing, handling over **1M transactions** daily.
Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns, achieving a **95% accuracy** rate.
Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services, processing **10,000+ predictions** per minute.

Leveraged **Python** and **C#** to design and optimize backend services for various applications, ensuring performance and maintainability while adhering to best practices.
Utilized **Java** and **C++** for developing robust solutions and enhancing existing applications, improving efficiency by **25%** through optimized algorithms and data structures.
Demonstrated exceptional **pedagogical skills** by mentoring junior developers and leading training sessions on best coding practices, fostering a collaborative learning environment.
Exhibited **creativity** in problem-solving by implementing innovative features that transformed user interactions and engagement metrics, leading to a **30%** increase in user satisfaction.
Applied **patience** and attention to detail when debugging complex systems, ensuring high-quality delivery with a bug resolution rate of **95%** within deadlines.
Developed interactive applications using **Unity**, leveraging game development principles to enhance user experience and engagement in educational software.
Engaged with learners of diverse backgrounds through gamified experiences with **Scratch** and **Minecraft**, promoting coding literacy and engagement in programming.
Implemented agile methodologies to streamline the software development process, resulting in a **20%** reduction in project turnaround time and improved team cohesion.
